obligations.title: Consent Management
obligations.description: Obtain valid consent from Data Principals before processing personal data
requirements: Consent must be free, specific, informed, unconditional and unambiguous
Consent must be obtained through clear affirmative action
Consent can be withdrawn at any time
Separate consent required for different purposes

obligations.title: Data Principal Rights
obligations.description: Ensure Data Principals can exercise their rights effectively

obligations.title: Data Security Measures
obligations.description: Implement reasonable security safeguards to protect personal data
requirements: Prevent unauthorized access and data breaches
obligations.penalties: Up to ₹250 crores for data breaches

obligations.title: Data Breach Notification
obligations.description: Notify Data Protection Board and affected individuals in case of data breach
requirements: Notify Board and affected individuals promptly
Provide details of breach and remedial actions
obligations.penalties: Up to ₹200 crores for failure to notify

obligations.title: Cross-Border Data Transfer
obligations.description: Ensure compliance when transferring data outside India
requirements: Ensure adequate data protection in recipient country
obligations.penalties: Up to ₹200 crores for unauthorized transfers

obligations.title: Data Retention and Deletion
obligations.description: Retain data only as long as necessary and delete when purpose is fulfilled
requirements: Define retention periods for each data category
Delete data when purpose is fulfilled

key_definitions.data_fiduciary: Entity that determines the purpose and means of processing personal data
key_definitions.data_principal: Individual to whom the personal data relates
key_definitions.data_processor: Entity that processes personal data on behalf of Data Fiduciary
key_definitions.personal_data: Data about an individual who is identifiable by or in relation to such data
key_definitions.consent: Free, specific, informed, unconditional and unambiguous indication of Data Principal's wishes
